research_problem.problem_statement: Classify patient survival outcome (alive vs deceased) from baseline tumor gene expression profiles using lightweight ML models.

goals.description: Achieve at least 80% accuracy in classifying patient survival outcomes

data_sources: tcga_brca_500samples_expr_survival.csv (500 breast cancer samples, ~20,000 gene expression features, target: vital_status âˆˆ {0,1})
